website_summaries.verdict: We love this packed collagen powder with 5 types of collagen from 4 different sources, and 9g of protein.
pros: Made with bovine, chicken, fish, and eggshell collagen
We like the 100% money back guarantee
cons: Not for people with a shellfish allergy or sensitivity
Gives some users headaches or GI problems

customer_reviews.title: Love how it makes my skin glow
customer_reviews.text: Order all the time! Love how it makes my skin glow, nails grow... helps my 60 year old joints!
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: Restless legs are gone! Appetite is down and not having so many junk cravings. Will continue to use. Update : it's been over a month and a lot of my cellulite has disappeared, I just started a new container this week.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: but am already pleased with the results
customer_reviews.text: Have only been using it for less than a month, but am already pleased with the results. I was having some hair loss due to a thyroid condition, but after taking this product, the hair loss has significantly improved.
customer_reviews.author: Carole E. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Formula Change??
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware!! I have used Dr Axe Collagen on a daily basis for over 5 years. It's always been light, almost fluffy, and dissolved in liquids easily. The last can I bought is significantly different. It's dense, heavy and clumps up in liquid. Even after several minutes it wouldn't dissolve. I used to put it in cold water so I tried room temperature water instead and it still wouldn't dissolve. It's a clumpy undrinkable mess! I sent an email to Ancient Nutrition who now owns Dr Axe Collagen to ask if there had been changes or had I just gotten a bad batch. The company has never responded to my inquiries. Time to look for a new collagen powder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective product!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been taking Dr. Axe Multi-Collagen protein for the last two months and she started noticing a positive difference in her digestive system function, her hair is growing and has less pain in one of her knees. I have also been taking the same product and it has helped me with weight control since I feel more satiated after a meal complemented with the powder. We will continue to buy and recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Perdomo

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its in my coffee every morning. Ive now used 3 cans of this mix ~ 6 months later...my nails are stronger, my hair has more shine & body and is growing much faster, even my joints are less achie and my tummy isn't giving me any more trouble ~ pst...i havent been ill, not so much as a sniffle too!!!! AMAZING PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.author: Ibdawatergirl

customer_reviews.title: Collagen
customer_reviews.text: This collagen is very good. It has helped my stomach issues tremendously. The only think I don't like is the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mae Long

customer_reviews.title: Best by far
customer_reviews.text: Best by far! Felt a difference in my joints in a few days. Oh and my alligator skin....is a thing of the past. I feel like butter!!! I'm not even at the end of my 1st container yet. Will NEVER be without :) Almost ready for my 3rd container. Love, Love, Love this awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen R

customer_reviews.title: 41 Year Old Male
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking this in my morning coffee for 2 months now. Some things I’ve noticed. Finger nails and toe nails are growing faster which for a guy is a bit annoying. Hair is definitely growing faster (my barber loves that). I did scrape up my hand and (wow) I noticed that the wound healed pretty quick. And I wasn’t dressing it cream or meds. I work out at the gym 2+ hours every day and where I would experience after workout pains and aches, I do not feel them any longer (which is great). I’m definitely going to keep drinking this and see where it takes me. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: HouBnkr

customer_reviews.title: Stomachache
customer_reviews.text: Sadly it gave me a huge stomachache. My stomach was so bloated I was scared. After reading so many good reviews I tried again but I can’t even finish drinking. 😭I was really hoping it would be good and work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product works beautifully as I can feel a difference in my skin
customer_reviews.text: This product works beautifully as I can feel a difference in my skin, hair, and body as I feel more energy, strength, and vitality. I recommend it highly as it contains every form of Collagen possible.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Fatigue and constant dull headache
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for three weeks. I have been taking 2 scoops per day. I have noticed no difference whatsoever. I still have joint pain that I was having before and I have noticed no difference in my hair, nails or skin. But I am really tired all the time and I have a constant dull headache that never goes away, even if I take something for the pain. I’m going to decrease to one scoop a day and I will update after a few weeks. I’m hoping that the headache and fatigue goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Fur Mama

customer_reviews.title: Can cause breakouts/allergy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have broken out in hives with red spots/bumps all over my chest and neck since starting this collagen. I now see some others are having the same issue so I also believe it to be this powder as I have not changed anythng else in my diet or skin care. Hoping it will resolve now that I'm stopping the product. I plan to go back to the Great Lakes Collegen Powder as it seems to dissolve easier and I have no bad side effects from that one. Update: Red Spots and bumps resolved after discontinuing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Al Pal

customer_reviews.title: I have only been using the Collagen Protein for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using the Collagen Protein for a week but I've already experienced less pain and my severe Psoriasis clearing up. Also, I had basal cell cancer removed from my chest about a month ago. It was taking forever to heal. Within a few days it was completely healed. I'm a believer and will continue to use your products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... when I saw one of my Kickboxing trainers post good things about it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product a few months back when I saw one of my Kickboxing trainers post good things about it. Thought I would give it a try and I am completely satisfied with my purchase. I mix two scoops in with my first cup of coffee in the mornings, it doesn't change the taste of my coffee and I can see the results in my skin and I love it. Since then I have reordered 3 times and will continue to use it as long as I can. Like the fountain of youth for my skin, my hair and nails!! Love it, recommend it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product... 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: As we get older our skin starts to thin and I have been getting broken blood vessels on my forearms for the last two years. Some days I have to wear long sleeves in the summer because it looks so terrible.I have been taking Dr. Axe's Multi Collagen protein powder faithfully for the last 2 months and after about a month I noticed that my arms were looking so much better, no more broken vessels. Now I only occasionally get a small one which clears up quickly. This product is like a miracle for me and one I will not stop taking.
customer_reviews.author: NIKKI

customer_reviews.title: 40-something skin
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and decided to give this a try. I feel it has helped my skin with moisture and firming. Will buy soon and will update review after the 2nd tub
customer_reviews.author: smilin j

customer_reviews.title: Half empty container.Not sure even if it real deal...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting full contaner of pruduct..When I opened only HALF..,It has odor not sure if it real
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Fanelli

customer_reviews.title: Terrible stomache pains and bloating
customer_reviews.text: It dissolves very easily and doesn't smell awful. Those are the only positive things I can say. I have given up trying to use this product. From day 1 the stomache cramping, bloating and over GI issues were an issue. Even with reduced dose the side effects are just awful. I would love my money back. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, this product did not agree with me. ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product did not agree with me. It gave me nausea and indigestion. I am usually a very energetic person but during the 2 weeks I took this product, I had aches in my body and felt tired.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gubser

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless!  blends well!
customer_reviews.text: I have NO CLUE how some reviewers claim it has a "taste". it is completely tasteless! I have used another brand of Collagen, only type 1, (green can), and that definitely had a "savory" taste of bone broth. this does not. I have mixed this in iced coffee, smoothies, and most often, hot coffee. tasteless and works great! I want to reorder and Amazon is out of stock? its great!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of three

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that for some reason this product didn't agree with ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that for some reason this product didn't agree with my system. I tried to use a less amount but no good for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner Collagen
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other collagen powders, and this seems to work best. I eat clean as much as I can, without going nuts. I think everyone understands that. The last thing you want is a supplement that has "false" ingredients in it. I swim, do yoga, and workout on a regular basis. Without it, there's more often than not, that "clicking" in my joints. I use it in my smoothie after a workout. Unless I find something better (I'm always looking), this will remain a part of my daily regiment. Take care, John K. Lund
customer_reviews.author: john kenneth lund

customer_reviews.title: Internal gold for skin
customer_reviews.text: It actually works saying that after only two days use. I decided to take before bed only once each day. I was surprised to wake up to any results. Given that most collagen like bone broth is mostly broken down upon digestion. Skin appears more nourished minor scratches and wounds have started exfoliating rapidly. Overall easy to take no bad after taste with a glass of almond or coconut milk.
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: ... hopes for this product after reading some of the great reviews. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product after reading some of the great reviews. Unfortunately, I did not experience any change in skin tone, longer lashes, or decreased inflammation. After using the product for 4 weeks (2 scoops per day), I began to notice a slight increase in joint inflammation, so I discontinued it. Because I have Rheumatoid Arthritis, I really wanted this product to work!
customer_reviews.author: LA Soucie

customer_reviews.title: Losing confidence in this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm starting to question the quality of this product. I have used this particular brand and type of collagen for more than two years. Over the last seven months I have noticed that the product arrives differently. Some canisters the product is white in color, and some canisters the product is brownish in color. The white colored product dissolves easily in hot liquid like coffee, and so-so in cool liquid like water. The brownish colored product does not dissolve easily in hot or cool liquid. The previous two orders were in the new container. The last order was in the old container, and the "best by date" was eligible.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Vertigo!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is definitely odorless and tasteless. However, from day one I experienced extreme vertigo. Three days in a row and I realized the only difference in my routine was this protein. Stopped and went back to my hemp protein and I've been fine since. Definitely check out side effects before assuming there are none like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Ichabod

customer_reviews.title: Histamine Response/sinus headach and flushes followed by hives
customer_reviews.text: Began taking this for joints (knees) and after approximately 3 weeks, I connected this as the source of flushes, and increased allergy (sniffles etc) . I did some research and found out this happens to some people. Quite a shame, for I would have enjoyed the benefits. Do begin taking this within the 30 return period. Thus if you have issues/allergies, ease in return or refund. I hear the allergic response while not that common, can happen. Began taking after the 30 return period.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Excercise caution
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it was offering many more Collagen Types than the powders I was Normally purchasing via Amazon. However, as noted by some, after several days of use I appear to have developed an allergic reaction to this product including hives. I do note that they do not state as much on their label Compared to other companies about specific contents. So some people may be sensitive to content in this product.
customer_reviews.author: karlander

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have not had anymore digestive issues since using this product. I have noticed my joints no longer hurt as well. My skin is looking better than ever as well. I had the pleasure to meet Dr. Axe when he led a nutrition class at my church. I was very impressed with the wealth of knowledge he shared. I highly recommend this and any of his products.
customer_reviews.author: A Person

customer_reviews.title: Something Changed
customer_reviews.text: I use this powder everyday right after my gym workout.Good for muscle healing and a bit of protein. I often mix it in with my morning coffee, sometimes a shake. I noticed the most recent batch of this powder refuses to dissolve easily in a warm liquid. My prior containers all dissolved quickly and evenly in hot beverages. As for cold, I usually place in a blender so this has never been an issue. I don't know what additive or something adjusted has changed the performance of this powder, but I do confess, I liked the earlier version better as far as absorbability.
customer_reviews.author: Aline

customer_reviews.title: Turning back my "clock"!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product after hearing that my daughter's friend experienced improvement in her skin, joints and hair. After tossing a scoop into a smoothie every morning for 24 days, I can see a difference in my skin, including the upper lip lines caused by being a former smoker!!! My hair had been thinning and too much was coming out when I shampooed. That has honestly improved. I plan to continue taking this product until the canister is empty, then order another one! It does not mix well with cold foods or drinks unless in a blender. I first tried it in cranberry juice, but it gave the juice an unpleasant taste.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Crazy

customer_reviews.title: Product has changed.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for several years. What I received Is not the same product. It was a different color & texture from past purchases. Also, the container was only 1/2 full. Have never experienced that much settling of product. This is not the same. Returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Michele B

customer_reviews.title: Collagen is great but be wary.....
customer_reviews.text: Have been taking this for about a week and I think it has improved my skin and joints! I mix it in with drinks or food and do not notice any taste, but I have a friend who swears she doesn’t like the taste! I guess people are different. The only issue, if it is the cause, is an itchy rash on my inner left arm! I stopped taking it and am going to see if it clears up. I have never experienced any food allergies and this is the only thing I have done differently in the past week. I’m really hoping it isn’t the cause because it has helped in other ways!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 2 years. I put it in my coffee every morning. My hair and nails are beautiful. I get compliments on them both. My skin has it's elasticity back. I am soon to be 61 years old. I love this product and recommend it to my friends. I only found one container that was difficult to absorb in coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product when my husband and I started the Keto diet. I use it in my Keto coffee each morning, and because my husband doesn't drink coffee, I put it in his green smoothie. My hair has been getting thinner in front, and I think I am already seeing a difference there. Over all, we are feeling so much better, and I am sure that is partly due to getting more collagen. I definitely don't want to be without it. By the way, the Keto coffee is just a scoop of collagen, 2 Tablespoons of Irish butter and a cup of coffee, blended in a blender. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Mitchell, J.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.....
customer_reviews.text: It’s only been a week so I am not seeing much yet but I am noticing my sugar cravings have diminished. A lot! My only complaint at this point is it can get lumpy in cold water and I think their definition of tasteless is different from mine. There is a slight taste.....not a bad taste but you are aware of something.
customer_reviews.author: K. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Im so happy I tried this protein powder. My skin looks clear and my sore back is much better. Love that it has all the major types of collagen needed for strong body. Will take it everyday
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Returned - here's why
customer_reviews.text: Blek, tasted metallic, and gave me a headache (which I don't get). I felt bad, and wondered about the source quality.
customer_reviews.author: colette evans

customer_reviews.title: First impression not good...
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order in the mail and opened it and the container is literally only 1/2 full. I hope this isn't a prelude to my experience with this product. Why on earth would they use a large container and only fill it half way. Already not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: ... it for about a month and it does blend easily with no discernible taste
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for about a month and it does blend easily with no discernible taste. Biggest concern is that the product content isn't broken down on the label as most other similare products are; makes you wonder. I requested a content analysis from the Dr. Axe store and received one, but why is it not on label?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Formula change and serving size differences
customer_reviews.text: There was definitely a formula change for the worse. It's now clumpy and has an undesirable taste. I also don't like that their recommended serving size is different between product sizes. Their customer service hasn't had great answers to why these issues exist. I am moving to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: ... am returning for a refund because I do not like the taste of it
customer_reviews.text: I am returning for a refund because I do not like the taste of it. The product claims to be odorless and tasteless, but I sense a strong bone smell, and it has a not so friendly taste. :(
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M

customer_reviews.title: I should be their spokes person!!
customer_reviews.text: I have Ankylosing Spondylitis, an auto immune disease that causes spinal degeneration, fusing as well as attacking bone, soft tissue in all joints. I started taking this & w/in 3 months, it really slowed down the process & gave me some pain relief. Nifty side effect is that its making my hair & nails grow like nothing I've ever seen before. I'm a hairdresser & have been recommending this to ALL my clients for BOTH health reason and hair/nail health. Ancient Nutrition should let me retail it in my salon & hire me as a spokes person!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendie D.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I love most of the products I have tried of Dr. Axe but this one is not one of them. I have been using NatiivePath collagen for about 6 months now but thought I would try this product. I wish I hadn't. My fingernails are peeling and are dry and I've had nothing but stomach issues since I started using it. It also doesn't desolve in cold liquid like NativePath collagen. I am going back to NativePath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My skin looks like I am 25yrs instead of 77yrs.
customer_reviews.text: Collagen being replaced with every scoop! My skin, hair and nails have improved since I started taking it the first week of January 2020. My nails were showing vertical ridges at Christmas. My skin was creepy looking. My daughter gave me 2 lbs of this product I started using 2 scoops a day and have been amazed at the results. I am 77 yrs and people even in the grocery are raving over my skin. I just wish I could get this on a monthly delivery for every month!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ford-Glen

customer_reviews.title: Great, versatile source of collagen
customer_reviews.text: I add the powder to my morning smoothie and to my bone broth. The powder doesn't affect the flavor or the texture. Perfect for my needs. My hair, skin and nails have all improved during the six months I have been using the collagen powder. Great stuff! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Tastes awful
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this because it has everything in it that I need in a collagen supplement at a great price...but the taste. It is such a strong flavor - I know it says flavorless, but it is not. I have to mix it in a smoothie because I cannot make myself drink it in tea or coffee. I can only describe the taste as something between a bone broth and fish flavor. Sadly, once this container is gone I will not he purchasing it again. I could not rate the pain relief adequately because I had no pain to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: FoxShe

customer_reviews.title: like a fungus
customer_reviews.text: There was something growing on the scoop, like a fungus. I am throwing this out!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I wish I'd taken a before and after photo but I use to have really bad keratosis Polaris on my upper arms and not they're ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this for about three weeks and I've seen major improvement on my skin. I wish I'd taken a before and after photo but I use to have really bad keratosis Polaris on my upper arms and not they're gone! I've also noticed less pain on my wrist from what I think could've been symptoms of carpal tunnel. I put in in my coffee every morning I can't taste a difference. At first I would add it to my daily lemon water and although I couldn't really say it tasted bad I felt it had a weird smell. A lot of it I think was mental. Overall it's a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what happened!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this thru Dr Axe's website, but when i saw it on Amazon with the convenience of faster shipping I switched. Not sure if the amazon powder spends more time on the shelf, but the times I have ordered it through Amazon the powder has a rank, pungent order and clumps in any kind of liquid. Its stomach turning. I would avoid this at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gipple

customer_reviews.title: Something isn’t right with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I received this today. I opened the can. It’s 1/2 full however it does state it’s 1 lb. Why not just use a smaller can? However that’s not the real issue. After drinking it with a glass of water I began vomiting. I now have numbness in my lips and my stomach is so upset. Allergies? Not sure but after reading some of the reviews it appears many have issues with this as well. This is going back tomorrow. Never again!
customer_reviews.author: mary mcnally

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This was a product that sounds beneficial but it was not for me. I began having the most terrible heartburn so I looked up the side effects of collagen and lo and behold there it was “heartburn”. So I stopped taking it immediately and my heartburn ceased! Be aware of this side effect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: 54 days in and buying again..my skin looks and feels great . It literally feels fresher and looks beautiful. I am 50 and I have used every cream there is on the market and now use German Nivea and collagen and this is a working combination !! I put one scoop in the bottom of My cup and add coffee and it dissolves and there is no taste whatsoever! I have no outbreaks and my skin is extremely sensitive, my lower back doesn’t hurt as much anymore and it seems easier to carry my 1 year old grandchild , I would say give it a good try , at least 30 days before expecting any changes .. it’s worth it
customer_reviews.author: Bianka Browne

customer_reviews.title: My digestion was better and some minor improvements in my joints
customer_reviews.text: At first I started seeing some improvements in my health when using the multi collagen protein. My digestion was better and some minor improvements in my joints. However, I started developing skin issues on my face the longer I used it. It started with just some itching around my nose and then progressed into peeling and oozing. It took several days after I stopped using it for my skin to start healing, but I haven't had a problem since.
customer_reviews.author: MJE

customer_reviews.title: First thing in the morning this with apple cider vinegar ...
customer_reviews.text: First thing in the morning this with apple cider vinegar and gelatin and Manjistha bark powder some honey and cinnomen a little tumeric and black pepper in warm water and your body says YES Lets go kick some Arse! then in about 30 minutes green tea....oatmeal n eggs for breakfast and not tell after 9 do you drink your a small coffee before you hit the gym and Explode!
customer_reviews.author: Autodidact

customer_reviews.title: I've tried many kinds of collagen and this one is ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many kinds of collagen and this one is the only one that I notice my eye lashes have grown and gotten longer!!! I would give it 5 stars if it would help the pain in my joints though. It dissolves in my morning coffee if I add the hot coffee to the powder before adding creamer. If I add creamer BEFORE the powder, then it clumps. I noticed results after just a couple of weeks of use!
customer_reviews.author: jodi

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality or quantity for price
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of collagen in general. Usually I use the sports research brand but I decided to try this one because it has protein. I purchased the small tub first then the larger tub. I’m SO disappointed in the amount of product that is in both the large and small tub. The tubs are only filled half way so for the price and any of product you get this isn’t a good deal compared to other brands that have just as good quality. It also doesn’t mix into hot drinks as well as other brands. I wouldn’t recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pope

customer_reviews.title: Formula Change?!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping the customer who wrote a review stating that the product seemed different than before was wrong...but I don't think he is! This purchase smells and tastes horrible! I blended in it a smoothie and can still smell it. I am so disappointed that a product this expensive, with as much clout behind it would taste as bad as it does. The one that I had before this (I'm not sure when it was bought as my mother gave it to me) did not smell or taste at all. Going to be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Rancid
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product but the last canister will not mix and tastes rancid. When I contacted Dr Axe were unconcerned and not their problem. Don’t risk it
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I've been seeing a functional medicine practitioner for severe candida over growth. As part of my diet and lifestyle change she suggested I add collagen powder in to my diet due to the vast amount of benefits it has to offer. I'm on my 2nd container and I have to say that I have gotten so many compliments on how my skin glows, not to mention how it has helped with my digestion and inflammation. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF TASTES DISGUSTING!! I TRY TO PUT IT IN MY ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS STUFF TASTES DISGUSTING!! I TRY TO PUT IT IN MY SMOOTHIE BUT IT MAKES IT TASTES AWFUL.. I WISH IT WAS TASTELESS.
customer_reviews.author: NITA

customer_reviews.title: Liking It Better Than The Other One!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as well as another bone broth type product. I absolutely like this one better. It mixes easily, unlike the other one. It does not have a taste so it goes in my coffee or protien shake. I bent down to get clothes out of the dryer and was shocked it wasn't so difficult to get back up. Haven't really noticed any great improvements with hair and nails but I didnt buy it for that reason. I am extremely active and wanted to see if it would decrease my aches in my knees and back. So far I really like this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have rarely written a product review. Frankly, nothing ever wows me enough to do so. This collagen powder is different. It really has made a huge difference in my hair! My hair was really thinning especially on the top. I was becoming very concerned because I saw my grandmother loose her hair on the top of her head and she was embarrassed by it. I started using the powder daily in my coffee. That was about 9 months ago and WOW my hair is growing back. Lots of new growth in the front and on top. I am so thankful! It takes time but it works!!!! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Harley

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but it does work so very well
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and will continue to buy it even though Inthink it’s too pricey. I’m trying a new one soon and I hope it works just due to price. That aside I have tried a lot and we went on vacation and I took another brand and regretted it. In one In bone on bone and so far only this pedi t keeps me not only active but pain free. I take 2’aervingana day and it keeps me mobile and I don’t need to push up off a chair or anything. It’s really amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Katopolous

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty, but it gives me a headache every time I drink it.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.  Wont buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in this product. It doesn't dissolve well at all and leaves a sandy sediment in the bottom of your cup. I expected more. I wont buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhmazing stuff...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product along with my significant other, we have both had overall health improvements, both of us have the color returning to our gray hair. He was white I had patchy gray. His hair is now getting darker by the day. I keep teasing him that soon I'll have to trade him in for someone with the distinguished look. It has been transformational as far as joints, skin, hair and nails. It's amazing!!! Update: the most recent hat I've gotten is not dissolving well and I'm getting chunks as one other poster had mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you dr. Axe for another great product.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this collagen for 3 weeks and I love it. I was having some pains in my knees that are gone now. I read some other reviews about the price being high but I think it is well worth the price. Plus if you look there are 58 servings in this container. Thank you dr. Axe for another great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Little

customer_reviews.title: Helped my knee!
customer_reviews.text: This collagen is one of my favorites due to the multiple sources it comes from. I originally started using bovine collagen for a knee problem- hoping it would resolve it. It seemed to help somewhat but only to a point. I found this one on Dr. Axes website and started using it with better results. It hasn’t healed up completely but it responded better than the other one. I have also noticed positive changes in skin and hair. This is my go to collagen but it is kind of pricey. For that, I deduct a star but the product is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: R Seals

customer_reviews.title: Will keep at it.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for almost a month. I have noticed improvements in my skin. Haven't seen any improvement in my knees but I think that might change after longer use. This is not tasteless or odorless. Im getting over it. Had a fishy smell and I have found putting it in my coffee or in my sweet and spicey tea from good earth hides the taste the best. Ill just keep at it and see what happens. I'm not crazy impressed but im not disappointed, I have read it takes a bit to get into your system and really start to work.
customer_reviews.author: TJ a Colorado girl.

customer_reviews.title: Worth a container to give it a shot. Makes a mess if you add sparkling water - just saying!
customer_reviews.text: The product dissolves well in warm and tepid liquids. Takes more time and stirring if the liquids are cold. It does dissolve completely and is flavorless. I mentioned initially there can be a whiff of collagen smell that quickly dissipates. This happens mostly in cold water. Makes a frothy mess if you mistakenly add sparkling water - just saying! I have not had a marked decrease in joint pain, yet. No tummy issues from using this on a daily schedule. I am expecting to have better news with pain cessation after continued use. Well worth the initial container or two to give it a chance to help. There has been no "down side" for me.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of where you purchase it from
customer_reviews.text: Received today and very disturbed. I think I received a counterfeit product. I included photo, I am glad I had original which I purchased at Whole Foods left (which I put in smaller container when there was a bit left), and on the photo you can see the difference in the two of “the same” product. Also, the smell of the powder was disgusting, it was very strong, seems like it wasn’t properly stored and started getting bad. So for purchases like protein powder, better to purchase from known places where you will be sure to get the best product for your money!
customer_reviews.author: Polya

customer_reviews.title: Collegan intake
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product twice. The first time I used it I noticed I was breaking out with bumps on my face. I thought maybe it was my skin care products. I discontinued the skin care to see if it the bumps would clear up..by this time I had finished my first container. My skin cleared up so I thought it was the skin care. I ordered my second container and noticed after 3 weeks that I'm getting the same bumps..minus the skin care product..I don't know what it is in this product but it definitely is the source of these bumps appearing on my face. Looking for another collegan protein product..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little extra stirring required
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different brands of collagen. I'm specifically using it to help support my TMJ as it is showing early signs of osteoarthritis and I'm just 33. I'm hoping that this specific collagen is doing more than the other brands to support joint health. I can't tell a difference after just a few weeks. I only gave 3 stars bc it doesn't mix as smoothly as other collagens and I actually notice the taste in my nightly tea. Doesn't bother me, as lon as it really supports my joints! Praying it helps my body.
customer_reviews.author: Allieloveshealth

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can't give any stars to this product unfortunately. I wanted it to work so badly. After trying it for the third time it just isn't doing anything for me. I still have swelling and pain in my joints, and I do not like the way it tastes or smells. Also, I thought I was having a detox reaction when I was experiencing rash in between my breasts on my chest and then read some of the other reviews and realized others were experiencing the same thing. Also, it does not dissolve well. It's a let down for sure, I am very disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Forrest

customer_reviews.title: the best product that I have ever use that actually does ...
customer_reviews.text: By far, the best product that I have ever use that actually does what it claims to do. My skin is glowing, I used to have pain on my knees and this product have helped with that ( I'm squatting like a champ), my hair is longer and beautiful. I think i'm in my 5th pot already, and I will continue to buy it. I wonder if this product help you to lose weigh because I have lost 20 lbs already in less than 6 months. I highly recommend this product. Thank you Dr. Axe for this awesome product, please don't stop making it
customer_reviews.author: Luisa gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: It’s working!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been having one scoop a day in my morning latte (coconut milk and monk fruit of course) for over 4 months. Suddenly my nails are getting firm and growing. All my life I have had very thin flat nails that peeled and split. They are starting to have shape and be very solid! Also by accident I stopped taking probiotics and now I don’t need them. Before I did need them and had taken them for years. I was not looking for that result, however the only thing I have started doing different was taking this collagen every day. It took a few months of daily use to see results, and it was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: LisaG

customer_reviews.title: It's a Miracle!!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this on a Sunday morning in my coffee, dissolved with a little extra stirring as opposed to a product I had been using, but that was OK. I didn't notice a taste or smell. The very next day I noticed a huge difference in my joint pain! My knees, hips and lower back were much better. I could put pressure on my right leg when I hadn't been able to for months. If this was after only one day of use I can't imagine how I'll feel after a few weeks or months of using this Miracle powder!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Rob

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am a 71 year old female and started taking this product for my bone on bone shoulder. I have been using it for about 5 months and have had amazing results. My should pain has diminished by 70% and range of motion has improved at least 50%. I thank God for helping me find this product. My 79 year old husband is now taking for his joints and feet. He has noticed improvements as well.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis J Sturdivant

customer_reviews.title: Beats Bone Broth
customer_reviews.text: My sister-in-law recommended Ancient Nutrition Multi-Collagen after I told her I was trying to consume enough bone broth to help my torn biceps and thinned rotator tendon before surgery and post-surgery. Collagen goes to the areas it's needed but I find it difficult to eat everything I am dedicated to. The answer? Ancient Nutrition's collagen as a little scoop can go into my 'Budwig Protocol' of Nancy's probiotic cottage cheese, 1 Tbps of Flax seed oil and berries. No taste or consistency change so extra-healthy. This is one supplement I'd recommend to everyone who works out, needs extra collagen to their injuries or just wants that collagen level that came with being younger!
customer_reviews.author: AnneJ

customer_reviews.title: Mixed reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed reviews about this collagen. I loved everything about it except it made my belly very bloated. It mixed well, no taste in my morning coffee. But after going through one container and starting the second container, i noticed how bloated my belly was getting. I was very disappointed because it did help me in other ways. My joints felt better, my hair, skin, and nails improved. Infact my hair grew like crazy and felt much thicker. Wished this would of worked.
customer_reviews.author: Gsavick

customer_reviews.title: On my third jar!
customer_reviews.text: Can really tell a difference in how fast my hair and nails grow (and that includes my eyelashes--oh my!)! I've also noticed better digestion. Now, don't expect overnight results!!! It wasn't until I was into my second jar that I started noticing big improvements. This is part of my normal daily routine now--one scoop in my am coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Sallie

customer_reviews.title: Will not be without!
customer_reviews.text: Started using this 3 months ago and liked it! I have always had pain in my left toe joint, and wasn’t comfortable wearing high heels, was really uncomfortable. Started adding it to breakfast and Within days the toe pain and clicking has disappeared. Have stared to wear high heels again. Ran out of the product and started using one by Orgain. Symptoms reappeared and stomach issues developed with Orgains Collagen. Have returned to Ancient Nutrition. And again noticed within a days my toe felt better again Now I’m committed to this product. Will take it in my morning smoothie forever! Its a little miracle worker!!
customer_reviews.author: neena sharma

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, dissolves quick, tasteless
customer_reviews.text: OK on the plus side: serving size is good at only 1 scoop a day, this powder dissolves easily in coffee, there is no unpleasant taste although it does change the coffee flavor a little, reasonable price, did not upset my stomach or bowels (very important for me). The cons: did not seem to help me at all even after using the entire container. Overall if you are looking to try a collagen powder I would give this one a try.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! ! Everything said about this is true. Physically I feel 100% better, especially in the gut. Drinking it every day and will continue.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Carlino

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff- just $$$$
customer_reviews.text: I love this collagen and used it for months, until the price increased. It’s flavorless and dissolves easily and quickly in coffee, and I saw a definite difference in my skin, hair and nails. But since their containers only last me about 2 weeks, and with the price increase it meant spending about $100 a month on collagen, I started looking for cheaper alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: coralreef

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, just a bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: This is the best collagen powder I have tried. It is noticeable through my skin, nails and hair! Others I have tried that are less pricy have not absorbed as well and not as noticeable. I am giving it four stars inly because of the high price, but love the product.
customer_reviews.author: SandraKub

customer_reviews.title: Does not measure up
customer_reviews.text: I have been using collagen in my morning coffee for a few years from another source. I decided to try This brand because it claims to offer more types than only I and II. I have now been taking it daily for 3 weeks and noticed that after the third day my joint pain returned and worsened. I wonder if the more variety of sources may actually interfere with the ability for them to be used by the body. So now I placed another order for the one that works best for me: Zint.
customer_reviews.author: P. McCann

customer_reviews.title: Great for joint health, drooping eyelids, less wrinkles, hip pain gone
customer_reviews.text: My 25 yr. old son said he noticed he's not having to wear an ankle brace, since using the collagen powder. He plays lots of basketball. His ankle joint has often given him trouble, esp. when he hasn't played in a while, or plays excessively. Amazing! I'm 52 yrs. old and I've found collagen powder took my hip pain away, and tightened my skin to where my eyelids are at the top of my irises, both within 5 months! I started noticing my skin getting smoother and less wrinkly, within 3 weeks of using collagen.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T.

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING PRODUCT. You're gonna love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding product. I am LOVING the overall results since I purchased. I does what it's billed to do, notices skin, nails differences. Does not flavor or adversely flavor any liquid drink dissolves very easily. The container comes 2/3rds full which is disconcerting, and I realize it's filled by weight, but this also means they could use less packaging. In my opinion, Ancient Nutrition should sell a refill pouch the consumer can place into the (reusable plastic container) and save on waste.. just a thought.
customer_reviews.author: L. A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to add to my morning smoothie and it dissolves quickly and does not impact taste. I think it's helping my skin - after sun damage and aging my skin is very thin and damages quickly. Since I've been using this product my arms look a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Jak1411

customer_reviews.title: Relieve your pain.
customer_reviews.text: Prior to taking Multi Collagen my joints ached, my knees were on and off painful along with a few other problems. After about a month of taking the product, I noticed the majority of my aches and pains disappeared. I can now get up from my chair easily and my mobility is better. I have been using it now for about 4 months and It has been a great product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger K.

customer_reviews.title: not even close to odorless
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if I got a bad batch or not, but wow. This stuff immediately clumps up in hot or cold beverages. Worst of all, it smells like a wet dog is in your cup.... extremely offputting for something claiming to be odorless. I contacted the company to see if I got a defective batch, and heard nothing. That makes me think this is normal for the product, will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product! I drink it in my coffee every morning. I can tell a difference since u began using it. I was diagnosed with hypothyroidism and this is suppose to help get our Thyroid back to functioning. I'm going to keep using it until my next ultrasound. See what difference it makes. It's also helped with my inflammation in my neck which led to Migraines.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Shaw

customer_reviews.title: allergy alert
customer_reviews.text: I broke our in a rash and hives after using. As far as I know I am not allergic to any of the ingredients ( I eat shellfish and shrimp). I stopped using and then tried again 2 months later. Same result with rash. I am trying to return but looks like return window is only 2 weeks. Does not have a strong odor so I thought it was a good product--just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Cundy

customer_reviews.title: Ancient Nutrition Multi Collagen is an excellent product for skin.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 64 years old, an age when the skin has thinned and bleeds easily. I’ve been adding this to my coffee every morning, and I’m amazed at the changes. I haven’t bled once in three months, and that’s with a new puppy. In addition to not bleeding, I noticed a couple other changes. I’ve had a pink scaly spot on each temple and on my cheek for about 3 years I thought I would have forever. They’re gone. Also my lips have peeled for many years. That’s gone too. I told my sister about it who can barely touch anything without bleeding. She said she’s already seeing a difference in just a week and a half. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Collagen
customer_reviews.text: Collagen Is one of my favorite things to take it’s good for your hair your skin your nails everything I’ve been taking collagen for years and sometimes I take powders in tablet but I like the powder because I added to my drinks my hair is great my skin is great really everybody to learn about it and start taking it and this is a good brand highly recommended and Mrs. easy with all my drinks all my drinks love love love it
customer_reviews.author: Linda Palmer

customer_reviews.title: There is an after taste
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used another brand of of collagen peptides for months and finally decided to try Dr. Axe. There is what I’d describe as a moderate (at the very least it’s moderate) “earthy” flavor and after taste with this collagen. Many folks say they can’t taste it. I’ll assume my taste buds may be overly sensitive. I have to follow the collagen with a glass of water immediately or eat something to kill the after taste. Does it help with the Crohn’s or joint issues and symptoms? TBD. It doesn’t dissolve on its own but with a brisk stir at least it does dissolve. Update 8/25 With slightly chilled water, the taste is not nearly as noticeable Updated to 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: John M. hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly helped with my Acne
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this product for a little over 2 months now. I've suffered from adult acne for over a decade. I actually started taking this to help with my overall health and hoping for a little help with my thinning hair. What I actually noticed is that it helped with my acne most of all! It does stink and has a fishy taste when it's mixed with anything other than coffee but usually i just mix with 4 oz of a flavored drink (propel, gatorade) and drink it quickly! I know results are different for each person but for me I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ancient Nutrition Multi Collagen Protein Powder - Pure, Formulated by Dr. Josh Axe, 5 Types of Food Sourced Collagen Peptides, Supports Joints, Skin and Nails, Made Without Gluten & Dairy, 16.2 oz
feature_bullets: NEW LOOK, SAME GREAT QUALITY - For a limited time, you may receive either packaging. Rest assured it still features five types of collagen from four food sources. Don’t settle for one or two types, when you can enjoy our specially formulated high-quality blend of bovine, chicken, fish and eggshell collagen peptides in a delicious powder

9 GRAMS PROTEIN, 35 CALORIES - One serving of Ancient Nutrition multi collagen protein powder mix provides 9g of protein and 10.2g of collagen and 35 calories in every serving! Add a heaping spoonful to any smoothie, shake, cold drink or hot drink for a daily boost of collagen protein.

BURSTING WITH BENEFITS - Every scoop features hydrolyzed collagen types I, II, III, V, and X from quality sources and provides a wide variety of health benefits including promoting healthy skin and nails while giving your joints and gut the support they need.

CLEAN & PURE SOURCES – Free from growth hormones and chemicals, our collagen protein powder is derived from chicken and eggs sourced exclusively from Midwest US farms, pasture-raised cows from South America and shellfish-free fish collagen derived from wild, cold water fish sustainably harvested in North America
OUR ANCIENT NUTRITION PROMISE – Not satisfied? Let us know and we’ll make it right for you!*
